mod.name: peeper
mod.author: slawkens
mod.config:
-- anonymously or display peeper name? anonymous = "no"
messageType = MESSAGE_STATUS_DEFAULT
mod.event:
domodlib('peeper-config')
local config = { anonymous = getBooleanFromString(anonymous), messageType = messageType }
function onLook(cid, thing, position, lookDistance) if(isPlayer(thing.uid)) then doPlayerSendTextMessage(thing.uid, config.messageType, (config.anonymous and "Someone" or getPlayerName(cid)) .. " is looking at you.") end
return true end
